HDG.IM.content: is Being a mere word or does it hold spiritual fate of the West? > this question may sound forced [method: demonstrate by way of assertion] [but the bell tolls, and we count wrong—even our experience of the question]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: is Being a mere word or does it hold spiritual fate of the West? > this question may sound forced [method: demonstrate by way of assertion] [but the bell tolls, and we count wrong—even our experience of the question]

HDG.BC.content: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]

HDG.BC.content: [do we belong anywhere at all?] to merely anticipate (ahnen) where we could belong: necessary to experience ourselves: “ourselves” re: what determines us, is other than us, but governs us [totally other?]: (we call this arbitrarily at first [willkürlich zunächst]) the inception of our history
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [do we belong anywhere at all?] to merely anticipate (ahnen) where we could belong: necessary to experience ourselves: “ourselves” re: what determines us, is other than us, but governs us [totally other?]: (we call this arbitrarily at first [willkürlich zunächst]) the inception of our history

HDG.BC.content: experience whole in possibilities (Möglichen)/necessities (Notwendigen) beyond merely actual (nur Wirkliche) > whole of beings: not a sum, not a represented “totality” > [“is” method?] in considering beings as a whole, we think the whole as a being, thus already think it from being [?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: experience whole in possibilities (Möglichen)/necessities (Notwendigen) beyond merely actual (nur Wirkliche) > whole of beings: not a sum, not a represented “totality” > [“is” method?] in considering beings as a whole, we think the whole as a being, thus already think it from being [?]

HDG.BC.content: clock stops, we become aware of “is,” an interruption intrudes on speaking [attention beyond time?] > can only experience interruption hypothetically [yes! Derrida, Nietzsche, bell tolls]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: clock stops, we become aware of “is,” an interruption intrudes on speaking [attention beyond time?] > can only experience interruption hypothetically [yes! Derrida, Nietzsche, bell tolls]

HDG.BC.content: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

HDG.BC.content: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]

HDG.BC.content: Being lets every being as such originate: Being is the origin ——no doubt about Being, the most reliable [but don’t we know Being by way of experience of beings?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being lets every being as such originate: Being is the origin ——no doubt about Being, the most reliable [but don’t we know Being by way of experience of beings?]

HDG.BC.content: only “beings” remain: what does that mean? > stand btwn 2 equally unavoidable limits: 1) we cast being away from us (das Sein wird von uns verworfen [cf. Freud foreclosure]) when we say Being “is” 2) can never disavow “Being” & “is” wherever we experience a being [“is” method]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: only “beings” remain: what does that mean? > stand btwn 2 equally unavoidable limits: 1) we cast being away from us (das Sein wird von uns verworfen [cf. Freud foreclosure]) when we say Being “is” 2) can never disavow “Being” & “is” wherever we experience a being [“is” method]

HDG.BC.content: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]

HDG.BC.content: place of man w/in beings (being that calculates, gift of reason), organism that deifies “reason” (1st happened in French Revolution) > “life” not, for man, object standing opposite him: life is what life itself accomplishes, enjoys, survives, what it guides through itself, carries by its own stream [river, Heraclitus], life is (as taught since 19th Century) “lived experience (Erlebnis)” > life veritably “overflows” w/ “lived experiences”
HDG.BC.linkedContent: place of man w/in beings (being that calculates, gift of reason), organism that deifies “reason” (1st happened in French Revolution) > “life” not, for man, object standing opposite him: life is what life itself accomplishes, enjoys, survives, what it guides through itself, carries by its own stream [river, Heraclitus], life is (as taught since 19th Century) “lived experience (Erlebnis)” > life veritably “overflows” w/ “lived experiences”

HDG.BC.content: one can capture “lived experiences” in reports > essence of man securely delimited: man is the presencing animal (animal rationale) [?] > balance btwn “calculability” of life & drunkenness of lived experience > anthropology, Americans seek determination of what man is, how he can be most efficiently/effectively used (am wirksamsten zu gebrauchen sei) , in most appropriate place, w/out loss of time or energy [Marx-like]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: one can capture “lived experiences” in reports > essence of man securely delimited: man is the presencing animal (animal rationale) [?] > balance btwn “calculability” of life & drunkenness of lived experience > anthropology, Americans seek determination of what man is, how he can be most efficiently/effectively used (am wirksamsten zu gebrauchen sei) , in most appropriate place, w/out loss of time or energy [Marx-like]

HDG.BT.content: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])
HDG.BT.linkedContent: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])

HDG.IWM.content: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.IWM.content: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being

HDG.QB.content: thinking needed urgently, granted that [if?] an adequate experience of this essence [essence of nihilism] can be prepared only in a responsive thinking [always preparing adequate experience] > essence of nihilism is heal-less (Heil-lose), unique pointer toward salutary [cf. p. 322 w/ hearty greetings] > if thinking to approach (nähern) realm of essence of nihilism, must necessarily become more precursory (vorlaüfiger) & thereby become other [totally other???]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: thinking needed urgently, granted that [if?] an adequate experience of this essence [essence of nihilism] can be prepared only in a responsive thinking [always preparing adequate experience] > essence of nihilism is heal-less (Heil-lose), unique pointer toward salutary [cf. p. 322 w/ hearty greetings] > if thinking to approach (nähern) realm of essence of nihilism, must necessarily become more precursory (vorlaüfiger) & thereby become other [totally other???]

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.QB.content: every restoration (Restauration) is an interpretation of metaphysics [but recovery or metaphysics not a mere restoration?] > Heidegger on “Destruction,” not a demolishing (Zertrümmerung) of metaphysics, intended only to reattain originary experiences of Being belonging to metaphysics by deconstructing (Abbau) representations that have become commonplace/empty
HDG.QB.linkedContent: every restoration (Restauration) is an interpretation of metaphysics [but recovery or metaphysics not a mere restoration?] > Heidegger on “Destruction,” not a demolishing (Zertrümmerung) of metaphysics, intended only to reattain originary experiences of Being belonging to metaphysics by deconstructing (Abbau) representations that have become commonplace/empty

HDG.QB.content: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying

HDG.FS.content: experience of rift (Riss) only possible in certain “return to” unity
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of rift (Riss) only possible in certain “return to” unity

HDG.FS.content: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger agrees with Wittgenstein [?]: “the real is what is the case” [no longer Greek experience of beings]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger agrees with Wittgenstein [?]: “the real is what is the case” [no longer Greek experience of beings]

HDG.FS.content: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger explains how the experience of a being understood as upokeimenon no longer stands there as phenomenon, no longer giving (presences) itself from itself, it becomes that about which we speak
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger explains how the experience of a being understood as upokeimenon no longer stands there as phenomenon, no longer giving (presences) itself from itself, it becomes that about which we speak

HDG.FS.content: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon

HDG.FS.content: when Heidegger looks at inkwell, does so w/out reference to hyletic data and categories, he undergoes fundamental experience w/ thing itself [outside consciousness but still moral image of thought?] > “being” in Da-sein says being-outside-of [vs. being in of consciousness], must preserve an “outside,” thus ek-stasis > Dasein rigorously means: ek-statically being there (immanence is broken) > from ek-stasis to instancy in the clearing (Inständigkeit in der Lichtung) [the turn?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: when Heidegger looks at inkwell, does so w/out reference to hyletic data and categories, he undergoes fundamental experience w/ thing itself [outside consciousness but still moral image of thought?] > “being” in Da-sein says being-outside-of [vs. being in of consciousness], must preserve an “outside,” thus ek-stasis > Dasein rigorously means: ek-statically being there (immanence is broken) > from ek-stasis to instancy in the clearing (Inständigkeit in der Lichtung) [the turn?]

HDG.FS.content: scholastic word objectum is translation of Greek word antikeimenon, but keisthai of antikeimenon means already lying before > whereas object, via representation, brought to halt in an “over and against (im Gegenüber)” > Greek experience of already lying before (and from itself) doesn’t require representation play role in positing being > Aristotle interprets phusis from poiēsis, bringing-forth into open—not modern notion of production (set into availability [Herstellen in die Verfügbarkeit])
HDG.FS.linkedContent: scholastic word objectum is translation of Greek word antikeimenon, but keisthai of antikeimenon means already lying before > whereas object, via representation, brought to halt in an “over and against (im Gegenüber)” > Greek experience of already lying before (and from itself) doesn’t require representation play role in positing being > Aristotle interprets phusis from poiēsis, bringing-forth into open—not modern notion of production (set into availability [Herstellen in die Verfügbarkeit])

HDG.FS.content: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)

HDG.CCP.content: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.DL.content: gesture (Gebärde) (gathering of a bearing [eines Tragens]) helps us experience (erfahren) truly what is to be said [about language?] [?], you intentionally avoid saying [cf. HASD]: our bearing (unseres Tragens, unseres Betragens), what truly bears (eigentlich Tragende), bears itself toward us (uns sich erst zu-trägt)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: gesture (Gebärde) (gathering of a bearing [eines Tragens]) helps us experience (erfahren) truly what is to be said [about language?] [?], you intentionally avoid saying [cf. HASD]: our bearing (unseres Tragens, unseres Betragens), what truly bears (eigentlich Tragende), bears itself toward us (uns sich erst zu-trägt)

HDG.DL.content: the call of two-fold can’t be explained by presence or present beings, nor in terms of their relation > only two-fold itself which unfolds (enfaltet) the clarity, the clearing (Lichtung), in which Anwesende als solches and Anwesen can be discerned (unterscheidbar) for man > no longer say relation to two-fold, not an object of mental representation, but: the sway of usage (das Walten des Brauches), which we never experience (erfahren) directly [!] [arrival?] if we think (vorstellen) two-fold as difference (Unterschied) visible in comparison that tries to hold Anwesende and Anwesen apart from each other
HDG.DL.linkedContent: the call of two-fold can’t be explained by presence or present beings, nor in terms of their relation > only two-fold itself which unfolds (enfaltet) the clarity, the clearing (Lichtung), in which Anwesende als solches and Anwesen can be discerned (unterscheidbar) for man > no longer say relation to two-fold, not an object of mental representation, but: the sway of usage (das Walten des Brauches), which we never experience (erfahren) directly [!] [arrival?] if we think (vorstellen) two-fold as difference (Unterschied) visible in comparison that tries to hold Anwesende and Anwesen apart from each other

HDG.DL.content: Heidegger associates phenomenological experience (Erlebnis) w/ “consciousness,” subject/object, refers life back to “I” > Heidegger tried to leave this experience behind in hermeneutic relation of two-fold [Heidegger affirms Erfahrung over Erlebnis?], but “nobody can in just one single leap take distance from the predominant circle of ideas,” especially re: well-worn tracks (langem eingefahrenen Bahnen)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Heidegger associates phenomenological experience (Erlebnis) w/ “consciousness,” subject/object, refers life back to “I” > Heidegger tried to leave this experience behind in hermeneutic relation of two-fold [Heidegger affirms Erfahrung over Erlebnis?], but “nobody can in just one single leap take distance from the predominant circle of ideas,” especially re: well-worn tracks (langem eingefahrenen Bahnen)

HDG.DL.content: w/ first experience of phenomenon, Greeks didn’t press present beings into opposing objectness (Gegenständigkeit) > phainesthai: a being assumes its radiance (Scheinen), in which it appears (erscheinen) > Das Erscheinen (appearance) still Grundzug of Anwesen von Anwesende, as [beings] rise into unconcealment (Entbergung) ——Heidegger doesn’t think appearance in Greek or Kantian sense > but, what’s decisive (ankommt) [arrival?] is difficult, calls (verlangt) for simple/free vision (Blick)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: w/ first experience of phenomenon, Greeks didn’t press present beings into opposing objectness (Gegenständigkeit) > phainesthai: a being assumes its radiance (Scheinen), in which it appears (erscheinen) > Das Erscheinen (appearance) still Grundzug of Anwesen von Anwesende, as [beings] rise into unconcealment (Entbergung) ——Heidegger doesn’t think appearance in Greek or Kantian sense > but, what’s decisive (ankommt) [arrival?] is difficult, calls (verlangt) for simple/free vision (Blick)

HDG.DL.content: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)

HDG.WL.content: mystery (Geheimnis) of language: language speaks solely w/ itself alone (Sie spricht einzig und einsam mit sich selber) > if we experience the way to language re: what happens along the way [rather than using scientific propositions], an intimation (Vermutung) may come in which language strikes us (anmutet) as strange
HDG.WL.linkedContent: mystery (Geheimnis) of language: language speaks solely w/ itself alone (Sie spricht einzig und einsam mit sich selber) > if we experience the way to language re: what happens along the way [rather than using scientific propositions], an intimation (Vermutung) may come in which language strikes us (anmutet) as strange

HDG.WL.content: are we so fully in language that we experience its nature? or is way to language longest road for our thinking?
HDG.WL.linkedContent: are we so fully in language that we experience its nature? or is way to language longest road for our thinking?

HDG.WL.content: a web compresses, obstructs the straight clear view (gerade Durchsicht) in its mesh (Verflochtenen) [condensation] > we can’t disregard web of language, what seems its hopeless tangle > attempt to loosen the web to view the “open togetherness (freie Zusammengehören) of the relations named in the formula”: try to experience unbinding bond (entbindende Band) in web of language
HDG.WL.linkedContent: a web compresses, obstructs the straight clear view (gerade Durchsicht) in its mesh (Verflochtenen) [condensation] > we can’t disregard web of language, what seems its hopeless tangle > attempt to loosen the web to view the “open togetherness (freie Zusammengehören) of the relations named in the formula”: try to experience unbinding bond (entbindende Band) in web of language

HDG.WL.content: the web of language is often considered circular, language determines the circle itself, might experience this movement by entering the web
HDG.WL.linkedContent: the web of language is often considered circular, language determines the circle itself, might experience this movement by entering the web

HDG.WL.content: diversity of elements in language, an original count (Zählen) not yet enumerable, a belonging together shows itself (ergab sich) > the count is a recounting that anticipates (auf vorblickt) the Einigende im Zusammengëhoren, but can’t make it appear > long history of inability to experience unifying unity of Sprachwesens, thus it remains w/out a name
HDG.WL.linkedContent: diversity of elements in language, an original count (Zählen) not yet enumerable, a belonging together shows itself (ergab sich) > the count is a recounting that anticipates (auf vorblickt) the Einigende im Zusammengëhoren, but can’t make it appear > long history of inability to experience unifying unity of Sprachwesens, thus it remains w/out a name

HDG.WL.content: phonetic-acoustic-physiological explanation of sounds (Lautung) of language doesn’t experience their origin in ringing stillness (Geläut der Stille)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: phonetic-acoustic-physiological explanation of sounds (Lautung) of language doesn’t experience their origin in ringing stillness (Geläut der Stille)

HDG.WL.content: we might prepare for this change in our relation (Bezuges) to language, perhaps this experience might awaken [arrival?]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: we might prepare for this change in our relation (Bezuges) to language, perhaps this experience might awaken [arrival?]

HDG.EC.content: did the younger man experience what is healing (das Heilsame) in contrast (Gegensatz) to the unwholesomeness (heillosen) of Camp? a fleeting self-deception? > no, because it has abided since morning in such a releasing (lösend), signifying (deutend), gathering manner…
HDG.EC.linkedContent: did the younger man experience what is healing (das Heilsame) in contrast (Gegensatz) to the unwholesomeness (heillosen) of Camp? a fleeting self-deception? > no, because it has abided since morning in such a releasing (lösend), signifying (deutend), gathering manner…

HDG.EC.content: this is all so simple & full of mystery, how could you know all this with such clarity since this morning? > in the simple experience (einfachen Erfahrung) of the coming, as that upon which we wait, what is healing draws near (naht), is granted (geworden) to us [so the experience is already the arrival?] > you say “to us” but it was only granted to you > I would like to share it now w/ you > my experience allows me to name for the you the wound beginning to heal, I was allowed/learned to presage (ahnen) [so priestly all this]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: this is all so simple & full of mystery, how could you know all this with such clarity since this morning? > in the simple experience (einfachen Erfahrung) of the coming, as that upon which we wait, what is healing draws near (naht), is granted (geworden) to us [so the experience is already the arrival?] > you say “to us” but it was only granted to you > I would like to share it now w/ you > my experience allows me to name for the you the wound beginning to heal, I was allowed/learned to presage (ahnen) [so priestly all this]

HDG.EC.content: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself
HDG.EC.linkedContent: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.OHF.content: a concept points to a forehaving/foreconception (Vorgriff), transports us to a fundamental experience, calls for a how of addressing (Ansprechens)/interrogating: transports (versetzt) us into the being-there of our Dasein (interpretation & worry [Bekümerung]) > fundamental concepts (Grundbegriffe) not later additions to Dasein, sondern vor-tragen (but carry forward, ex-press), grab/point Dasein in their way [auto-affection?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: a concept points to a forehaving/foreconception (Vorgriff), transports us to a fundamental experience, calls for a how of addressing (Ansprechens)/interrogating: transports (versetzt) us into the being-there of our Dasein (interpretation & worry [Bekümerung]) > fundamental concepts (Grundbegriffe) not later additions to Dasein, sondern vor-tragen (but carry forward, ex-press), grab/point Dasein in their way [auto-affection?]

HDG.OHF.content: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger warns against taking a so-called experience (Erlebnis), an isolated act, for plain experience (schlichte Erfahrung), as if the single experience unlocks the meaning of being-there, reality in general
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger warns against taking a so-called experience (Erlebnis), an isolated act, for plain experience (schlichte Erfahrung), as if the single experience unlocks the meaning of being-there, reality in general

HDG.OHF.content: der Einsatz (initial engagement & bringing into play), “as what” facticity is grasped/stirred in advance, arises out of fundamental experience, out of truth of primordial self-interpretation of philosophy
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: der Einsatz (initial engagement & bringing into play), “as what” facticity is grasped/stirred in advance, arises out of fundamental experience, out of truth of primordial self-interpretation of philosophy
